title: Generate batter profiles from DuckDB + CSV sources
description: Populate batter profiles: career stats from analytics_ipl_batting_career (since 2023), phase from analytics_ipl_batter_phase, tags from player_tags_2023.json, clusters from player_clustering_2023.csv, entry points from batter_entry_points_2023.csv, vs bowling type from batter_bowling_type_detail_2023.csv, vs teams from analytics_ipl_batter_vs_team. Handle missing data gracefully (uncapped players get 'No IPL data' flag).

florentino_gate.reason: Core product functionality surfacing existing data. Founder-mandated.
